Articles.Content:
So here is something for the lovers of historical aircrafts, a JU-52 replika that i made witch is about a accurate as it can get (not bragging btw) .

So here are some stats to compare.

Real version: speed:58.61 m/s. lenght:18,9m. width:29,25m. height:4,5m.

My version: speed:70 m/s. lenght:22,1m. width:31,7m. height:7.2m.

So not too far off then now is it. It also flyes beautifully aka very responsive and very cabable altough very slow just like the real one.

Here are some picks of it.

And remember kids as it is with all taildragger aircrafts, dont brake too hard or you will roll over to your roof (I accidentaly broke off the nose engine while taking this screenshot) .

And yes you could say im preety proud of this one .

The mods you will need for this are: B9 aerospace pack, Firespitter pack and procedual wings mod.

Download link:https://www.dropbox.com/s/tauz9r8xbkdlvnc/JU-52%20Iron%20Annie%20%28flagless%29.craft?dl=0. (the aircraft supplied will be flagless)

So i hope you enjoy flying this golden peace of aviation history .

Edited October 15, 2015 by kapteenipirk
